verbs.description: [ARG0: A Democratic congressman] [V: chastised] [ARG1: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [ARG2: for " sabotaging " trade negotiations as the fallout from this weekend 's tense G7 summit continues , lending President Trump some bipartisan support as the war of words between the two countries escalates] .

A Democratic congressman chastised [ARG0: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] on Sunday for " [V: sabotaging] " [ARG1: trade negotiations] [ARGM-TMP: as the fallout from this weekend 's tense G7 summit continues , lending President Trump some bipartisan support as the war of words between the two countries escalates] .

A Democratic congressman chastised Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau on Sunday for " sabotaging " trade negotiations as [ARG1: the fallout from this weekend 's tense G7 summit] [V: continues] , [ARGM-ADV: lending President Trump some bipartisan support] as the war of words between the two countries escalates .

A Democratic congressman chastised Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau on Sunday for " sabotaging " trade negotiations as the fallout from this weekend 's tense G7 summit continues , [V: lending] [ARG2: President Trump] [ARG1: some bipartisan support] [ARGM-TMP: as the war of words between the two countries escalates] .
